title: Ghost Towns of Fukushima Remain Empty After Decade-Long Rebuild
content:
1. Ghost Towns of Fukushima Remain Empty After Decade-Long Rebuild  Bloomberg
  2. Japan’s Tsunami and Nuclear Disaster Unleashed a $300 Billion Effort to Rebuild a Hinterland  The Wall Street Journal
  3. PHOTOS: No-go zone near nuclear plant once hosted picnics  Associated Press
  4. The Mayor’s House Was Firebombed. The Message: Keep Our Town Nuclear-Free.  The New York Times

localize.title: 长达十年的重建后，福岛的鬼城依然空空如也。
長達十年的重建後，福島的鬼城依然空空如也。
